title: I had to dodge because of this.
body: Just another reason to lose lp, not going to bother for a compensation or anything just ffs.

replies.body:
Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

It's not a bug I've seen anyone else report, but if you feel it may not be limited to your client you can submit a bug report here: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report
It was fine once i restarted the client, but if it caused me a loss in a promotion or something, i'd be fuming..
